plan_benefits:
24 Hours Emergency Assist Hotline
            Call +65 6222 7737 for assistance while you are overseas

Medical Expenses
            Incurred Overseas and for follow-up medical treatments upon return to Singapore

Extensive coverage including COVID-19
            Receive comprehensive trip coverage before, during and after your trip, including COVID-19

Overseas Medical Expenses
            Get covered up to S$700,000 overseas medical expenses

Trip Cancellation, Curtailment and Disruption
            • Up to S$10,000 for trip cancellation• Up to S$8,000 for trip curtailment• Up to S$1,000 for trip disruption

Baggage and Personal Effects
            Get covered up to S$6,000 for accidental loss or loss to baggage and personal effects
plan_overview: Pack your bags and leave your worries with us. Travel smart with the insurance that’s as valuable as you are.

plan_benefits: Optional Add On NCD Protector when your NCD is 30% and above
Free addition of up to 2 named drivers

24 Hours Emergency Roadside Assistance
            Call +65 6222 7737 for roadside assistance
plan_overview: Designed to protect your vehicle against loss or damage and also your legal liability against third party.

plan_benefits: Covers accidental loss or damage to your property within your house up to S$150,000

24 Hours Emergency Assist Hotline
            Call +65 6222 7737 for emergency home care services

Save up to 20% premium*
            *if you purchase a 3-year plan
plan_overview: Designed to protect your assets within your residential premises arising from any unforeseen and sudden physical loss or damage from any cause other than those specifically excluded.

plan_benefits:
Free Automatic Increase in Benefit
            The sum insured for accidental death benefit increases 5% each year (up to 5 years)

Get covered for Accidental Death, Permanent Disablement and Medical Expenses
            Provides you with 24-hour insurance protection worldwide

No Medical Check-up required for you to enrol
            Hassle Free Enrolment
plan_overview: To provide financial protection for yourself or your family in the event of an accident. This insurance protection covers you 24 hours a day and everywhere you go.
